experiences: Design Leadership: Led the UI/UX design team for a comprehensive accounting web application.

Frontend Implementation: Actively contributed to the development phase using TypeScript and Express.js .

API & Real-Time Integration: Configured dynamic data layers and event triggers to link live CCTV feeds and real-time API data directly to dashboard components, creating a responsive and immersive user experience.

Engineered a streamlined peer-to-peer (P2P) trading journey, implementing intuitive visual feedback for blockchain transaction states and smart contract execution to ensure user confidence and transparency.
High-Fidelity Design: Created a comprehensive design system in Figma for the Admin Treasury and Building Wallet, supporting real-time monitoring of energy consumption and token balances.

Cross-functional Integration: Bridged the gap between complex blockchain backend logic and frontend UI by designing clear error-handling states and transaction feedback loops, reducing user friction during network latency events.
